channel.title: Need help with webclient - finding the "link" for it...? Help please
channel.description:
Okay, well I have a site on freewebs, and I add it and everything but I dont get what to do with this "link" to the client thing, what does that mean...? [code]

YOURSERVER Client

[/code] thats what i was given. btw my site is www.freewebs.com/daggerscape if that has anything to do with the client.... and the .jar for the client is called signed_application.jar... please help, it would be greatly apreaciated =][br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 05, 2008, 09:47:42 AM[/size][hr]cmon some1 please help :([br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 05, 2008, 09:48:05 AM[/size][hr]any1....[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 06, 2008, 07:02:21 AM[/size][hr]:( please help

item.title: Need help with webclient - finding the "link" for it...? Help please
item.dc:creator: @sw1tchez sw1tchez
item.description:
@sw1tchez wrote:

Okay, well I have a site on freewebs, and I add it and everything but I dont get what to do with this “link” to the client thing, what does that mean…?

[code]

<body style="margin:0;"

background="http://i253.photobucket.com/albums/hh56/kill

er-99-pkz/pixi.gif">

YOURSERVER Client

[/code]

thats what i was given.

btw

my site is www.freewebs.com/daggerscape if that has anything to do with the client… and the .jar for the client is called signed_application.jar…

please help, it would be greatly apreaciated =][br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 05, 2008, 09:47:42 AM[/size][hr]cmon some1 please help :([br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 05, 2008, 09:48:05 AM[/size][hr]any1…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 06, 2008, 07:02:21 AM[/size][hr] please help
